name: ARIES
description: Aries Markets is the first and the largest lending protocol on Aptos since launched in October 2022. Aries Markets is also the No.1 DeFi App in the Move Ecosystem with $750 million total deposit. Serving as the gateway to Aptos DeFi, Aries Markets provides a comprehensive suite of services including lending, borrowing, and margin trading, while enabling seamless integration with ecosystem projects through Aries DeFi Suite.
